description: This file defines an interface class IFactories within the WPEFramework::PluginHost namespace. It declares methods for obtaining proxy types for web requests, responses, file bodies, and JSON-RPC messages, and includes static methods related to instance management. The file also includes licensing information and external dependencies.

classes.name: IFactories
classes.description: An interface class providing factory methods for creating web-related objects such as requests, responses, file bodies, and JSON-RPC messages within the WPEFramework.

methods.name: Assign
methods.description: Sets the current instance of IFactories.

methods.name: Instance
methods.description: Returns a reference to the current instance of IFactories.

methods.name: IsAvailable
methods.description: Checks if the IFactories instance is available.

methods.name: Request
methods.description: Creates or retrieves a proxy for Web::Request.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Creates or retrieves a proxy for Web::Response.

methods.name: FileBody
methods.description: Creates or retrieves a proxy for Web::FileBody.

methods.name: JSONRPC
methods.description: Creates or retrieves a proxy for Web::JSONBodyType<Core::JSONRPC::Message>.
